code: import Layout from"../layouts/Layout";import{useLoaderData}from"react-router-dom";import{useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostList=_ref=>{let{text}=_ref;useEffect(()=>text("PostList"));const data=useLoaderData();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Layout,{list:data,text:text});};export default PostList;export async function postListLoader(_ref2){let{request,params}=_ref2;const postListResponse=await fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts");let postListResData="";if(!postListResponse){throw new Response(JSON.stringify({message:"Could not fetch"}),{status:500});}else{postListResData=await postListResponse.json();}return postListResData;}
